name: All Too Human: King of the Settlement
name_original: All Too Human: King of the Settlement
description:
King of the Settlement is a vertical slice of the project All Too Human (a RTS game set in vasts wastelands still in development).
See All Too Human TigSource devlog for further info.

This vertical slice features the unit control part of the project only (the city building and memetics stuff are not there).
The match starts and gives 3 units to you and 3 to the AI. Your objective is quite simple, beat the AI and win the match.
The goal of this demo is to validate the unit control mechanics (which is complicated  and demand a lot of effort).

Note: all sounds, musics and some 3D assets are free content and I don't own them. They'll be replaced.

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpncwk1vJPAiG2bbny4J3yw

CONTROLS
- mouse left button to select/deselect units;
- mouse right button to give orders to the selected unit;
- mouse wheel to zoom in/out;
- mouse middle button to rotate the camera;
- keyboard arrows or W/A/S/D keys to move the camera;
- Q/E or Del/End to rotate the camera;
- Z/X or PageUp/PageDown to zoom in/out.
